newsitem.title: USA: Temple Summit has funding pact in place.
newsitem.headline: Temple Summit has funding pact in place.

text.p: Temple Summit Financial Projects Inc said Monday it has a funding agreement in place that should close within the next few weeks.
The company said the undisclosed funds "will be more than adequate to develop our current project as well as secure" new reserve blocks.
The company is looking to expand its present gold reserves with prospective properties in Idaho, Arizona, Utah, and Ecuador, it said in a statement.

"We have some excellent opportunities in front of us which we need to take advantage of for the continued long term growth of the company and enhancement of its stock," it said without providing any details.
